subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: LeBron James scored 35 points and Mo Williams sparked a decisive rally to lead the Cavaliers to a 101-93 victory over the Celtics in Game 1 of their Eastern Conference semifinal series.
snippet: LeBron James scored 35 points and Mo Williams sparked a decisive rally to lead the Cavaliers to a 101-93 victory over the Celtics in Game 1 of their Eastern Conference semifinal series.
